markdownRemark.html: I’m participating in the Advent of Code this year! It’s a programming challenge released each day for the first 25 days of december. In 2018, I completed all problems within 24 hours of being released (including the notorious day 15); I hope to repeat that performance this year. Check out my solutions on github or join the event yourself!

frontmatter.title: Connect to Phoenix channels using React and Typescript
